about: Cross-platform sync strategy
title: "[PROD] Cross-platform sync strategy"
labels: "-Top Level Document, _Production Plan"
assignees: ''

---

_For games on multiple platforms or ecosystems._

## Includes

* _Platform-specific feature variance_
* _Save/progression sync_
* _UI/UX adaptations per device_
* _Input method parity (controller, KB/M, touch)_
* _Certification per platform_
* _Performance targets (FPS, resolution, memory)_
* _Online services integration per ecosystem_
* _Anti-cheat & security strategy_

## Why AAA Needs It

_AAA titles often launch on PC + consoles + cloud services simultaneously._
